data: Contract for the mortgage of land and equipment
contract for the mortgage of land and equipment
ISic030061. Contract for the mortgage of land and equipment

2[.]ΠΙΛΥΣΕΙΛΥΣΑΣΘΑΙΔΕΝΙ[.............]
3[.]ΞΑΜΗΝΩΙΔΙΩΝΟΣΕΙΜ[..---]

5ΤΙΟΣΑΙΣΧΡΙΩΝΟΣΦΙΛΩΝΑΡΙΣΤΑΡΧ[.....]
6ΦΙΛΙΣΤΙΩΝΟΣ      
7ΑΜΠΟΧΟΙΑΙΣΧΡΙΩΝΣΤΡΑΤΙΟΥ      
8ΑΙΣΧΡΙΩΝΟΛΤΟΥΦΙΛΩΝΑΡΙΣΤΑ[...?...]
9ΦΙΛΙΣΤΙΩΝΟΣ      

Apparatus criticus

Text is from Manganaro in ASNP 1977. The main alternative is Comparetti's editio princeps in NotScav 1912.; C. adds two speculatively restored lines before the first preserved line: [.............................................]; [.........]ὰ, C.
2: [..]ὶ, C.; ἐνι[.....]      , C.
3: [..]ξαμήνωι, C.
4: Ἄμ[.]οχοι, C.; Αἰσχρίων Σίρα, Ἡρ[··]στλ[..?], C.
5: νος, C.; Ἀριστάρχ[..]      , C.
8: C. interprets the monogram as indicating a connection between the two Aischrions listed one after another; M. follows De Sanctis in considering it an error; Ἀριστά[....]      , C.

English translation

...all that goes with...upon paying it off; and he is to pay it off (sc. the debt) in a year, or in six months following it (sc. the mortgaged property) is to be Dion's. Guarantors: Aischrion son of Stratios, Stratios son of Aischrion, Philon son of Aristarchos son of Philistion. Guarantors: Aischrion son of Stratios, Aischrion son of Oltos, Philon son of Aristaios son of Philistion.
